channel.title: Pumpkin Mask/Skeletal Set
channel.description: So, the new confirmed rare for Runescape 2007. The Jack O' Lantern Mask and the Skeletal Set. The Skeletal spawns separately from the Jack O' Lantern. These rares are untradeable. I find this exciting, because it means people can't camp the spawns (once you get a set, you can't pick up another). The set is really cool looking too. Does anyone plan to camp tonight for a set? I know I am. Feel free to post here if you get a set, too. The sets are spawning all in one spawn, so you don't have to look all over for pieces of the set.

item.title: Pumpkin Mask/Skeletal Set
item.dc:creator: @Porygon Porygon
item.description:
@Porygon wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:9, topic:522638”][quote author=casey. link=topic=641138.msg4319544#msg4319544 date=1372035418]

They should first implement a good anti-botting system before dropping rares rofl.

no thanks
[/quote]

and this is good i just need to find this and i can train for the entire week not running around collecting rares like a maniac[/quote]
I’m not actually going to look for this weeks rares. They’re untradeable and will be released during the Halloween event.

Read full topic

@Porygon wrote:

So, the new confirmed rare for Runescape 2007. The Jack O’ Lantern Mask and the Skeletal Set. The Skeletal spawns separately from the Jack O’ Lantern. These rares are untradeable. I find this exciting, because it means people can’t camp the spawns (once you get a set, you can’t pick up another). The set is really cool looking too. Does anyone plan to camp tonight for a set? I know I am. Feel free to post here if you get a set, too. The sets are spawning all in one spawn, so you don’t have to look all over for pieces of the set.
